item.title: Teachings of a Loving Father
item.description:
Teachings of a Loving Father by Elder Horacio A. Tenorio, Of the Seventy given in Sunday Afternoon of 160th Annual General Conference on Sat Mar 31 1990
This meta-podcast is not published, maintained, or endorsed by The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints, but instead by a faithful member of the Church who is seeking ways to make consuming Gospel content easier for everyone. If there are any mistakes, please report them on GitHub and we'll try to get them fixed.
item.itunes:author: Elder Horacio A. Tenorio, Of the Seventy

item.title: Let Us Build Fortresses
item.description:
Let Us Build Fortresses by Elder Horacio A. Tenorio, Recently Released Member of the Seventy given in Saturday Afternoon of 164th Semiannual General Conference on Fri Sep 30 1994
This meta-podcast is not published, maintained, or endorsed by The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints, but instead by a faithful member of the Church who is seeking ways to make consuming Gospel content easier for everyone. If there are any mistakes, please report them on GitHub and we'll try to get them fixed.
